Active Bonuses/Penalties 3

Use this to apply bonuses (or penalties) to all rolls of the specified type rolled using the sheet's macros. With the exception of the Spell Save DC bonus field, all the fields can accept any combination of dice rolls and static numbers.

Spell Book g

Use this section to track spells you know, spells in your spell book (Mages), and/or Spells that you have prepared for the day. Cantrips and spells that you know that do not count against your daily prepared limit (such as cleric domain spells, Mage school spells, etc..) should be listed as "Always Prepared" in the prepared column.
